Detailed Description

Object used to write to new or existing files on the file system.

TODO: DOC, example use etc

TODO: only supports UTF-8 and binary

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum chaos::io::sys::FileWriter::Flag

Flags that can be used to describe how the file handle should be opened.

These flags can be combined together using the logical or operator.

Enumerator
FLAG_NONE 

No flags specified.

FLAG_BINARY 

Operations are performed in binary mode rather than text mode.

FLAG_APPEND 

If the file already exists new data will be written to the end of of the file. If this flag is not specified writing to existing file will cause the original contents to be discarded.

void chaos::io::sys::FileWriter::open ( const chaos::io::sys::Path &  path)
virtual

Sets the path and opens this writer to it.

This function is short hand for:

my_file_writer.set_path( m_path );
my_file_writer.open();
Exceptions
chaos::ex::StateErrorIf this file handle is already open.
chaos::io::sys::InvalidPathErrorIf the path cannot be opened

Reimplemented from chaos::io::sys::FileHandle.

void chaos::io::sys::FileWriter::close ( )
virtual

Closes this file writer and writes data to the file system.

Once the file is closed write operations cannot be performed until the file writer is reopened.

This function does not need to be explicitly closed. When this object is destroyed it will be ensured that data is written and the handle is closed.

Exceptions
chaos::ex::StateErrorIf this file handle is not open.

Implements chaos::io::sys::FileHandle.

void chaos::io::sys::FileWriter::write ( const chaos::uni::UTF8String &  text)

Writes an chaos::uni::UTF8String to the internal buffer of this file writer.

The internal buffer is only written to the file system when this file writer is closed.

Exceptions
chaos::ex::StateErrorIf this file handle is not open.
void chaos::io::sys::FileWriter::write_line ( const chaos::uni::UTF8String &  text)

Convenience function to write text with a following new line character.

See write().

Exceptions
chaos::ex::StateErrorIf this file handle is not open.
